@@ -0,0 +1,28 @@
+def parse_csp(header):
+    directives = {}
+    parts = [p.strip() for p in header.split(';')]
+    for part in parts:
+        if ' ' in part:
+            directive, data = part.split(' ', 1)
+        else:
+            directive = part
+            data = True
+        directives[directive] = data
+    return directives
+
+
+def test_selfrepair_csp_allows_framing(conf, requests_session):
+    r = requests_session.get(conf.getoption('server') + '/en-US/repair')
+    r.raise_for_status()
+    if 'Content-Security-Policy' not in r.headers:
+        # no CSP, no problem
+        return
+
+    csp_data = parse_csp(r.headers['Content-Security-Policy'])
+    if 'frame-src' in csp_data:
+        assert csp_data['frame-ancestors'] == '*'
+    else:
+        assert csp_data['default-src'] == '*'
+
+    if 'framce-ancestors' in csp_data:
body_text: Whoops, typo. You mean frame-ancestors I think.
body: Whoops, typo. You mean `frame-ancestors` I think.
